snippet.title: Big brother untangles baby babble
snippet.description:
Science & Environment / 1 July 2009
10 to 12 million words of speech to transcribe. "For anyone that has transcribed speech, they will know that is a laborious and slow process,"

snippet.title: Opening up sign language to all
snippet.description:
27 October 2008
Seonag MacKinnon reports on moves to make British Sign Language more accessible.
